import Head from "next/head"; import gsap from "gsap"; import {useState,useRef} from "react" // Timeline GSAP var initial_menuTL = gsap.timeline({ paused: true, defaults: { duration: 1000 } }) .to('.hamburger', { left: "unset", right: 0, ease: Power2.easeOut, }) .to('.rubriques', { height: "auto", ease: Power2.easeOut }, "-=1") .to('.list-rubriques-mobile', { transform: "translateX(0)", ease: Power2.easeOut }, "-=1") .from('.list-rubriques-mobile li', { transform: "translateX(-100%)", opacity: 0, ease: Power2.easeOut, delay: (index, element, all) => { return index * 0.2 } }, '-=1') .reverse() export default function Base({children,route}){ const hamburger = useRef(null); const rubriques = useRef(null); const rubriques_mobile = useRef(null); const rubriques_mobile_item = useRed(null) const [menuTL,setMenuTL] = useState(initial_menuTL); const handleClick = function () { if (menuTL.reversed()) { setMenuTL(menuTL.play()) } else { setMenuTL(menuTL.reverse()) } } return(
